identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.tone: Electric Professional. Futuristic yet accessible. Trustworthy but bold.

colors.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default with Dark Mode Toggle

gradients.brand_text: bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 via-violet-600 to-purple-600
gradients.glass: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 dark:border-white/10

hero.structure: Centered text with 3D floating card visual
hero.cta: Two buttons: Primary (Get Started) + Secondary (View Demo)
hero.background: Subtle mesh gradient or abstract shapes

features.cards: Glassmorphism effect, large icons, short punchy text

pricing.highlight: Tracing beam border effect on popular plan

dashboard.structure: Sidebar navigation (collapsible) + Topbar + Main Content Area
dashboard.cards: White cards with soft shadow, no borders in light mode

public_profile.links: Stack of full-width buttons with icons
public_profile.save_contact: Sticky bottom button or prominent top button

shadcn_mappings.Button: Use for all CTAs. Variant 'default' for primary, 'outline' for secondary, 'ghost' for nav links.
shadcn_mappings.Card: Base container for dashboard widgets and features.
shadcn_mappings.Dialog: Use for 'Edit Profile' and 'Share Card' modals.
shadcn_mappings.Tabs: Use in Card Editor (Content | Design | Settings).
shadcn_mappings.Badge: Use for 'Pro' labels or status indicators.

custom_components.PhoneMockup: CSS-only or image-based mobile frame for previewing the card.
custom_components.QRCodeGenerator: Component wrapping qrcode.react with download options.
custom_components.ColorPicker: Custom grid of preset brand colors + hex input.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic 'Inter' font for headings. Use 'Outfit'.
Do NOT use full-screen solid gradients. Use subtle mesh or spot gradients.
Mobile-first design is CRITICAL for the public profile page.
Dark mode should not be pitch black (#000), use Slate-950 (#020617).
Buttons should be pill-shaped (rounded-full) for a modern feel.
Use 2x more padding than you think is necessary.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'lucide-react', 'framer-motion', 'clsx', 'tailwind-merge' if not present. 2. Initialize shadcn/ui if not present (or manually create components using the provided styles). 3. Create the 'Outfit' and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' font classes in index.css. 4. Build the Landing Page first, then the Auth flow, then the Dashboard.
